title: Cheesy aubergine bake with pasta
ingredients: ['1 aubergine, peeled and cut lengthways into 6mm slices', '1 egg, beaten', '125g seasoned dried breadcrumbs', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '250g ricotta cheese', '10 slices prosciutto', '1 (400g) jar pasta sauce', '225g grated mozzarella cheese', '1/2 (500g) packet vermicelli pasta']
